client.app

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.app.Client

  • public class Client
extends Object
    Class representing the Client application. Holds all object data and maintains the state of the Application. Interacts with Database object and manages conversions between Java Objects and mySQL database entries. Serves as applciation server to remote instances of application running.

    • Method Detail

      • setCurrUser

        public void setCurrUser(String uname,
                        String pw)
                 throws ElementNotFoundException,
                        UserLoggedInException
        Function to set the currUser variable. Queries LOCAL Database with login credentials. Throws Exception if if login credentials are invalid.
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException
        UserLoggedInException

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User u)
        Function to add User object to local Database. Allows user to sign in with registered credentials
        Parameters:
        u - instantiated User object to be added to Database.

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(ScheduleEvent e)
               throws UserNotFoundException,
                      ElementNotFoundException
        Function to add an event to currUser.myEvents. Queries the Database found at DatabaseConnection db. Effectively completes the "subscription" process of the currUser to this Event.
        Parameters:
        e - ScheduleEvent object that the currUser is subcribed to.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException
        ElementNotFoundException

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe(ScheduleEvent e)
                 throws UserNotFoundException,
                        ElementNotFoundException
        Function to delete an event from currUser.myEvents. Effectively completes the "un-subscription" process of the currUser to this Event.
        Parameters:
        e - ScheduleEvent object that the currUser is unsubcribed to.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException
        ElementNotFoundException

      • registerOrg

        public void registerOrg(DatabaseConnection newOrg)
                 throws ElementNotFoundException,
                        UserNotFoundException
        Function to add an organization to currUser.myOrgs and allow Client to connect to it. Places newOrg into orgs.
        Parameters:
        newOrg - a DatabaseConnection object representing the data store connection hosted by the organization
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException
        UserNotFoundException

      • forgetOrg

        public void forgetOrg(DatabaseConnection org)
               throws ElementNotFoundException,
                      UserNotFoundException
        Function to remove an organization from currUser.myOrgs.
        Parameters:
        org - a DatabaseConnection object representing the data store connection hosted by the organization.
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException
        UserNotFoundException

      • createEvent

        public void createEvent(ScheduleEvent e)
                 throws ElementNotFoundException,
                        UserNotFoundException
        Function to add a ScheduleEvent to currUser.myHostedEvents. Makes a ScheduleEvent available to be subscibed to.
        Parameters:
        e - ScheduleEvent object that the User has created.
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException
        UserNotFoundException
